  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["playlistId","interval"],"properties":{"playlistId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Playlist ID"},"interval":{"type":"integer","minimum":60000,"description":"Interval in milliseconds (minimum 1 minute)"},"enabled":{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"Whether schedule is enabled"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
